thread.section_title: Bento&co評価／レビュー | お客様は Bento&coの評価／レビューをしました。 | bentoandco.com
thread.title: shirni ong
thread.title_full: Bento&co について 投稿者 shirni ong

author: shirni ong
title: shirni ong
text:
They have a wide range of cute bentos and accessories.
Really felt like buying everything!
They are fast in meeting the logistic, I received my purchase quickly even though it was a oversea purchase.
They are responsive in emails and any questions that you have.
Very friendly too.
Overall, a nice experience buying with them.
